title._content: George Washington's official letters and signature

tag.raw: American Congress Title page of Official letters to the honourable American Congress with George Washington's signature
tag.author: 14456531@N07

description._content: Detail showing George Washington’s signature on the title page of Official letters to the Honorable American Congress, written, during the war between the United Colonies and Great Britain, by His Excellency, George Washington, Commander in Chief of the Continental Forces, now President of the United States. London: printed for Cadell Junior and Davies…1795. 2 vols. NLS shelfmark: H.S.597 Find out more about rare Washington items at the National Library of Scotland: www.nls.uk/learning-zone/politics-and-society/american-po...
